alert.note: Alert for Leake; Neshoba; Newton; Rankin; Scott (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 29 at 7:20PM CST until November 29 at 7:45PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CST FOR SOUTHERN LEAKE...NORTHWESTERN NEWTON...NORTHEASTERN RANKIN... NORTHERN SCOTT AND WESTERN NESHOBA COUNTIES... At 720 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Dowdville, or near Edinburg, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Pearl River around 725 PM CST. Philadelphia around 730 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Lena, Walnut Grove, Sebastopol and Standing Pine. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for central and east central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
